participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Passionate and adventurous, Larry enjoys both the kitchen and the great outdoors. He loves to explore new flavors and techniques in cooking, while also having a playful side with his fondness for comic books.
participant_1.background: if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. spiderman is my favorite. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and competitive, Jessica thrives on the excitement of pushing her physical limits. Her dedication to gymnastics is matched only by her enthusiasm for sharing her achievements with others.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i'm a gold medalist olympian.
